title: Banned for toxic. Should i have been?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
The first %%%% reference was to the enemy fail dive and my team laughed. I carried that game and worked great as a team.

My very first ban??

replies.body: If anything it should be a perma ban. There should be zero tolerance for racism, but hey that's OCE riot for you. You're able to get away with toxicity to the fullest extent for so long without being punished.

"what a [racial slur]"

"stop complaining you [racial slur]"

Throwing racial slurs around is one of the fastest ways to get punished. Just because you, and maybe even the one it is directed at believe it to be a joke, there are still 8-9 other players in the game that probably don't.
